items.text:
The paths around White Sky are a mess. Broken branches and fallen
trees litter the ground, and long sections of them have been washed
away. The village itself was mostly unharmed. A few boats were
displaced or lost, and the utility buildings near the shoreline took a
beating, but thankfully that’s about it. Everywhere you go, you see
villagers hard at work, cleaning up around the lake. If you can spare
the time, they would appreciate your help.
Search the General set for Flood Damage, and put it into play.
